about.title: THOR is the next-generation automated electric tractor, built for hard work and harsher conditions.

reliable.title:
More
 Reliable
reliable.text: Fewer components, less oil, and a modular design that allows changing a motor by undoing the covers, eight bolts, and two cables.

cost-efficient.title:
Cheaper
 to operate
cost-efficient.text: Same upfront cost to comparable 80kW tractors, cheaper to operate annually.

non-stop.title:
Around the clock
 operations
non-stop.text: 200kW swappable batteries allow around the clock operations of the heaviest tasks.

compatible.title:
Fully
 compatible
compatible.text: Our Category 2, ISO 730-1, three-point hitch lets you use your favorite tractor implements.

agro.title: Agriculture
agro.description: THOR helps farmers work more efficiently by filling labor gaps, cutting costs, boosting yields, and doing it all with clean electric power.

senior-mechanical-engineer.title: Senior Mechanical Engineer
senior-mechanical-engineer.description: Own the full hardware design of the vehicle.

sales-manager-agriculture.title: Sales Manager (Agriculture)
sales-manager-agriculture.description: Own the full sales cycle for agriculture.
